11.content: Blossom woke up in an unfamiliar place. The last thing she remembered was that she was fighting off some villian... She tried to get up, but she found that her hands and feet were tied to a bed. Panic rushed over Blossom as she tries to get out. Suddenly, the door opened. At the door there was someone in red clothes. She couldn't really see much in the dark. Then, the figure flipped the switch as the light came on. It was Brick! Blossom panicked even further as she blurted out, "Please don't spit balls at me, please don't spit balls at me!" Brick laughed as he replied, "I'm not gonna spit some spitballs at you." Blossom felt a bit better. "Are you going to rescue me?" Blossom asked in hope. "Nah, not gonna do that either," Brick said, "I'm gonna do this!" Brick quickly climbed up the bed, his back facing Blossom, standing up with his legs split on either side of Blossom. Then, Brick sat down on Blossom's face! Blossom panicked as she struggled, making her head even deeper in Brick's ass. "Eat this!" Brick said as he farted a long one! It was so long and intense, Brick actually peed himself a bit. "God, that feels much better," Brick sighed in relief, "How are you doing down there?" Blossom had to breath in the whole fart, so she was feeling rather dizzy. The smell was unbearable. Even Brick himself thought that it smelled bad. "Don't worry, Blossom, I have much more in store for you," he said, "Now, I'm going to..."

12.content:
Boomer hovered over the unconscious Bubbles. She was completely tied up now after she and the other girls had been completely and utterly defeated in their latest fight.

He sighed softly. It was getting boring waiting for her to wake up. Boomer certainly wasn't a patient boy, as he had quite a bit of energy.

He gently smacked her face a few times, making sure to wipe it off afterwards. Cooties are very contagious as you know.
"Hey...Hey...Heyyy.." Boomer whined.

The blonde powerpuff slowly came to and opened her eyes.
"What the?.."

"You're finally awake~"
The boy stared down at her with a grin.

"H-huh?! Where am I and..Why am I tied up?!"

Boomer giggled to himself. Geez she sure was dumb. How could she not know why? I mean...Wasn't it obvious?

"I'm getting some payback for the times you and the other powerpuffs kicked our butts...I mean..It was totally unfair!"

The rowdyruff stuck out his tongue.

Bubbles looked confused to say the least. She just wanted to go home...But that surely wouldn't be soon.

"Well what are you going to do?" she asked.
"I mean...Besides being rude and gross, you're pretty harmless." she pointed out.

"Hey! T-that's not true...Well whatever! Just shut up!"

He got on top of her.

Bubbles blushed just a bit.
"That's mean.."

Boomer turned around, showing off his ass and pulling down his pants to reveal nothing underneath.

The powerpuff gagged.
"Gross! That's uncalled for you know!"

"Well...You said it yourself. I'll use my grossness to my advantage then!"

He sat down on her face, scrunching up his own and letting out a monster of a fart.

BBBBBBLLLLLLLLLRRRRBBBTTT

It was only about seven seconds, but the smell made up for the time.

The blonde boy sighed softly, putting a finger in his ear.
"Have some of this too!"

He laughed, smearing the wax onto the side of her face.

Bubbles protested as much as she could, but it was all muffled into his ass.

She really did hate this...

13.content:
After a long, fierce battle against the Power Puff girls, the Rowdy Ruff boys had triumphed, using their all their best moves to defeat their female foes.

Now, as the dust cleared, Buttercup lay at Butch's feet, weak after the battle.

"C'mon Butch, let's get outta here!" yelled Brick a few feet away, grinning triumphantly over his rival, Blossom.

"Yeah!" chimed in Boomer, "We've got tons of food back at the clubhouse. I'm starving!"

Butch looked down at the defeated Buttercup. She was a tough girl, and she had put up quite the fight. Now she was looking up at him angrily, her green skirt and short black hair still covered with dust from the battle.

"No, you guys go on ahead," replied Butch. "I have some unfinished business."

Butch had always had feelings for Buttercup, though of course he would never admit it. He admired her boldness and her feisty attitude, how she wasn't afraid to get into a fight, much like him. But he also hated how Buttercup ignored him; never seemed to take any notice to him.

Well now, he had her right where he wanted her, and this time, she was definitely going to pay attention.

"Well, well, well," grinned Butch, looking down at Buttercup. "It seems the Power Puff girls are no match for us Rowdy Ruff boys."

"Whatever!" grunted Buttercup, struggling to get up. "Just wait 'till tomorrow, then we'll really whoop you. I was just going easy on you." Little did she know that by tomorrow, she would be fully in the possession of her victor.

"Not so fast!" replied Butch, proceeding to sit right on Buttercup's back, flattening her to the ground with her chin in the dirt.

"I beat you, which means you don't get to do anything unless I say you can!" said Butch, sneering. "Now, think it's time I show you the extent of my powers."

Butch began to peel off his right sneaker. His feet were hot and sweaty from the battle, and he was dying to give them some well-needed fresh air.

"Aaaah, that's more like it." Butch sighed, wiggling his socked toes right up in Buttercup's face. "How do you like that?"

"Gross! Get off me it stinks!" cried Buttercup, struggling to get free from from under Butch's butt.

"I don't think so," laughed Butch. "we're gonna have a little fun!"

Buttercup would soon find out that Butch never washed his feet, and always reused the same pair of socks. In fact, his foot smell was one of the key weapons he used to subdue his enemies. Now, Buttercup was facing them at their worst.

"I think you should smell my feet some more, maybe then you'll learn to appreciate them," said Butch, pushing his socked foot closer onto Buttercups face, this time rubbing his toes over her nose and mouth. They smelled like hot moldy cheese, and Buttercup's eyes were watering from just a few sniffs.

"No! Stop!" cried Buttercup, writhing under him. "OK, Ok, you win!"

Butch giggled. This was too easy. Whereas once she had been so defiant, now Buttercup was begging him for mercy under the stench of his feet.

Butch removed his feet from Buttercup's face, and she was finally able to breath in some cool, fresh air. She was relieved, and thought this was the end of her torture. Unfortunately for her, the reprieve from Butch's feet was short-lived. He had more plans for her in store.

He picked up his sneaker, which over the course of the day had collected quite a good amount of sweat and and toe cheese. Butch felt the inside sole of the shoe: still warm and moist from the battle. Perfect.

"Oh Buttercup," he said mockingly. "Ready for round 2?"

"Wha--NO!" yelled Buttercup. But before she could protest some more, Butch shoved his hot wet sneaker right into her face, creating a stinky mask over her nose and mouth.

"MMmmmmppphhhhhmmmmMM!!" writhed Buttercup, who was inhaling the toxic fumes of her captor's feet against her will.

"There's no point in fighting it. By the end of our time together you're gonna love my smell!" Laughed Butch.

Buttercup could feel the soft warm rubber sole and fabric against her nose as Butch pushed the shoe closer onto her face. The greenhouse-like effect the shoe created was giving her nothing but hot, stinky air to breath, courtesy of Butch's foot fumes. The combined heat and stench proved too much for the girl, and slowly her consciousness began to fade...

------

When she awoke, it was dark, she was in an unfamiliar location, and she couldn't move her arms or legs.
Then looked around and realized she was strapped to a bed. Butch's bed.

"Have a good sleep?" laughed Butch, startling her.

Suddenly the stench hit her. She was, after all, trapped in the room of a very smelly boy.

"Ugh, let me out! Just wait till I get out of here!"

"Oh no," replied Butch. "We're just getting started.

Now I'm going too..."
13.title: Butch and Buttercup

131.content:
Butch's stomach began to gurgle. "Oh," he said, grabbing his stomach. "Me and the boys had some spicy Burritos for lunch today, and I think it might have given me bad gas."

Buttercup looked around the room, taking in her surroundings. She couldn't believe she'd been bested by this punk! To her disgust, she found that the harnesses that bound her to the bed were actually a string of Butch's smelly socks.

"You jerk! Get me out of here!" Screamed Buttercup.

Butch grinned. "You must be hungry," he said. "Why don't I give you a taste of this?" Butch placed his butt right next to Buttercup's face, the fabric of his jeans brushing up against her cheek.

PPPPRRRRbBBBBFFFFFFFFFBBBBBBbbbb

He ripped a loud fart right next to her face. She could feel the vibrations coming from the boys butt, and they didn't stop for around 20 seconds.

"Aah," sighed Butch, a dumb grin sweeping over his face. "Oh wait there's more."

Ppprrbtttt

a short burst of gas was released from his butt, followed by two more...

Prrbbbtt

Prrbbbbbbbbttt

...right on her face.

"UGGHH YOU'RE SO GROSS!" screamed Buttercup, who was attempting to break free from her restraints to no avail.

Butch wasn't listening as he prepared to release more farts on the defiant girl's face.This time, he gave of a long silent but deadly that nearly had Buttercup gagging.

"That's it!" she yelled, and in retaliation, Buttercup bit his left cheek.

"OWW!" yelled Butch. He turned around to glare at Buttercup. Now he was visibly angry, and an evil smirk crept over his face. "You're gonna wish you hadn't done that."

Butch picked up a dirty sock off the floor, farted on it, and proceeded to shove it in Buttercup's mouth.

"There, that should keep you in line."

After that he pulled the covers over Buttercups head and dutch ovened her with his farts, creating a stinky cave of sock stink and post-Burrito fumes. Tears rolled down Buttercup's cheeks as the combination of Butch's farts, along with the taste of his sweaty sock, enveloped her completely.

After what seemed like an eternity, Butch lifted up the covers.

"Now have you learned your lesson?" he asked.

Buttercup nodded. In this realm, Butch was her master, and she would have to obey him or face the wrath of his stench.

"Good," Butch smiled.

Now, I want you to...

The sheer volume of the fart alone was enough to scare anyone from from a mile away, and it was released square on top of Buttercup's face. It stunk of rotten eggs and it blew her hair back with the ensuing force. But the initial loud fart was only round one: now there were after-shocks, as Butch's butt sputtered, with more sporadic, short burst farts. The smell invaded her nose and she could taste it in her mouth. What did she do deserve this cruel torture?

After what seemed like an eternity, Butch lifted his butt away from her. Buttercup looked around, eyes still watering as thick green cloud covering the entirety of the room. The boy stood over her, hands on his hips in a show of triumph knowing that he had just completely engulfed her in the scent of his farts.

"Well, are you starting to like my smell?" said Butch, grinning.

Buttercup scoffed. She may have been weakened by the boy's nasty gas, but she wasn't ready to give in yet. She'd never be his fart slave! Or so she thought...

"Hmm...I see." replied Butch, visibly disappointed. "Well then it seems I'll have to..."

"Big Billy, you're up first. Pick a girl and give it your all!"

Billy stood over Blossom, smiling like a kid with a new toy. With a surprisingly swift motion, he picked her up by her long hair and belched the loudest, smelliest, deep burp right in her face. He then set the girls' leader back down. Still feeling queasy, Blossom used what little strength she had to try to punch Billy. Unfortunately her fist ineffectively sank in the green giant's squishy fat belly, not enough to hurt but just enough to move enough gas for another gross burp to the face.

With the Powerpuff's fist stuck in his gargantuan girth, Billy let out a big laugh as he pushed Blossom's face into his navel. "Lick it clean, twerp! There's plenty of food stuck in there for ya!" That was definitely no lie; a cocktail of lint, sweat, crumbs, and flab entered Blossom's mouth and nose. After a good minute of being forced to lick, she was quickly pulled out and slammed to the ground.

Vision still blurry from the torture, Blossom didn't notice at what point Billy took his pants off, but it all became very clear when he thrusted his nasty underwear clad butt in her face. He leaned backwards, pinning her under his butt. The smell was quite bad, but then became unbearable as Billy let out a barrage of wet, eggy farts. Her face effectively swallowed whole by Billy's asscrack, Blossom had no choice but to inhale the rancid air.

After a while, Billy briefly rose from his seat, giving Blossom the chance to breathe the fresh air of the outdoors. Unfortunately, he soon sat back down, this time without the stained cloth he called underwear. "Shut up, okay! It's not like I know you're telling the truth anyway...!" Buttercup somewhat had a sneaking suspicion that this was all some kind of prank. But, at least it would be something to look forward to this rather boring week. Besides, being personally asked for help was a bit refreshing compared to being asked as part of her whole team.

After following Morbucks behind the school, the "bratty" princess stopped in front of the door in front of her. "I-it's in here..."

"Oh really? Pfft, you're scared of a door?" Buttercup would rudely assume, before forcibly pushing the door open. However... There appeared to be nothing but a dark storage room of the sorts. Nothing to be afraid of... "Wait a second, what sick joke is thi-"

"Night night!~" And before she could react, Buttercup suddenly found herself getting zapped with an unhealthy amount of electricity.

After a few hours of forced sleep, Buttercup found herself asleep within what looked to be Morbucks own room, and chained up and drained of her powers... "What the hell!? Damn princess...!" And that's when she saw Morbucks sitting in the bed in front of her, glaring and smirking at the same time.

"Well well well.... Looks like I'm the one who has the power now, and I don't have any powers!~" The princess would tease, trash talking Buttercup.

"Well you still are powerless, and you're just like your sister, only more ****ing pathetic !" She'd shout, having enough this brats crap.

After you patronizing taunt, you detach her dress from your finger and leave her deep in your ass. " Maybe I'll wet you out in my next shit. In the mean time, I'll play with your tough sister."

"Ha!" She says, angry. "It'll take a lot more than a few gross moves to make me cry."

"Now, Buttercup, it's time for you to experience my stench."

And so you sit on the tiny Buttercup the same way that you sat on Blossom, so she is between your two ass globes, perfectly safe, until.

BLRRRRRRRRRRRRP!!

The deadliest fart makes Buttercup scream in agony. Her nose suffers so much under your rotten smelling ass that her lungs cannot comprehend. She refuses to cry though, but it's not enough to just hear her scream. You must see salty tears leave her eyes.

So, in order to make her cry, you decide to . . .

15512.content:

Now that the girls have been crushed and are barely conscious on the ground, they decide to take the weakest one, as she is the most fun to torture.

Boomer, the blonde giant, picks up Bubbles and places her between his butt cheeks, fitting her perfectly in his plump boy ass. He then releases a long, wet fart which Bubbles cannot escape from. She is stuck between Boomer's cheeks and feels his stinky air flying past her.

Brick and Butch then make their way over to their brother's butt and farts directly into Bubble's crying face. She is sickened by stinky gases which smell like old cheese and rotten eggs. She is now being smooshed by rowdyruff boy butts. She let's out loud sobs and screams for help.

"Somebody help me!! PLEEEEASE!!!!" She wails in her high voice.

The boys allow Bubbles to scream for a few minutes, but when she gives up, she sees that Butch has used the time to leave an enormous pile of rich brown shit on the ground, larger than a car.

Boomer then let's Bubble's out of his butt and throws her down hard. Bubbles has mixed feelings about her landing, as it has been cushioned, but by the soft, wet texture of Butch's shit.

Butch then bends down and aims his farthole directly at you.

"Eat this, fart eater!" He screams as he releases a huge fart, which sends a few remaining chunks of shit, still inside his ass. The tiny but large pieces of brown wet waste land in Bubble's face and she wants to vomit, but she tries not to. All holding her vomit does is create more tears from her giant bug eyes.

"Alright," says Brick. "Now it's my turn."

Brick then lays Bubbles down and lies on top of her, crushing her against his stomach. He then lifts himself up slightly and places his hand inside his pants, listening to Bubbles scream and thinking of the most arousing things he can. He then jiggles inside of it and then removes his pants as soon as creamy Semen leaves his body. He unleashes his long strings of come and coats Bubbles in it as she continues to sob.

"Please stop!" She begs, closing her eyes and allowing them to swim.

The boys look at Bubbles, covered in shit, butt sweat and come. She's been tortured a lot, but not nearly enough.

"Haha!" Brick laughs. "This is just the beginning, Sissy!"
